companyName: The Sampson Law Firm - Louisville, KY

moreBlocks.websites: https://www.jeffsampsonlaw.com/ https://www.jeffsampsonlaw.com/blog/ (Sampson Law Firm Blog)

description:
In Louisville, Kentucky, victims of motorcycle accidents, auto collisions, nursing home malpractice and large truck accidents often need strong representation. At Sampson Law Firm, we focus our practice on assisting clients with a wide range of personal injury matters. From product liability and premises liability to dog bites and medical negligence, we have the experience necessary to build a strong case for each client.

Our legal team understands that when people receive catastrophic injuries as a result of another person’s negligence, it can have a devastating effect on their lives. Brain trauma, spinal cord damage, broken bones and severe burns can lead to extensive medical expenses. People may be unable to return to work or engage in everyday activities. At Sampson Law Firm, we have the ability to achieve successful outcomes for our clients through negotiations and aggressive litigation.

Jeffrey T. Sampson, founding attorney of the law firm, is a member of the Louisville Bar Association, the Kentucky Bar Association and the American Bar Association, as well as the American Association for Justice. Kentucky Trial Court Review has named him as one of Kentucky’s most prolific trial lawyers. In addition to these honors, Mr. Sampson has spoken before professional groups about medical malpractice. He has dedicated his practice to assisting clients throughout Kentucky with their personal injury needs.
